Reference

All functions

adapt_scales()

Scale ggseg plot axes.

aseg

Freesurfer automatic subcortical segmentation of a brain volume

aseg_3d

Freesurfer automatic subcortical segmentation of a brain volume

brain_pal()

Generate palettes from the ggseg atlases

brain_pals

ggseg palettes

brain_pals_info()

Get info on brain palettes

display_brain_pal()

Plot the colours of the atlases for selection

dkt

Desikan-Killiany Cortical Atlas

dkt_3d

Desikan-Killiany Cortical Atlas

ggseg3d()

Plot 3D brain parcellations

as_ggseg3d_atlas()

`ggseg3d_atlas` class

as_ggseg_atlas()

`ggseg_atlas` class

theme_brain() theme_darkbrain() theme_custombrain()

ggseg plot theme

install_atlases()

Convenience function to install all atlases from ggsegExtra-repo

is_ggseg_atlas()

Check if is ggseg_atlas-class

scale_brain() scale_colour_brain() scale_color_brain() scale_fill_brain()

Colour and fill scales from the ggseg atlases

scale_continous_brain() scale_x_brain() scale_y_brain() scale_labs_brain()

Axis and label scales from the ggseg atlases
